displayProperties.description:
A fragment of Eramis's armor. A reflection of what could have been.

Perhaps a place can be found for it at the campsite.

A fragment of Phylaks's armor. Winning the battle against the Warrior was the first step in defeating Eramis. 

Perhaps a place can be found for it at the camp site.

A fragment of Kridis's armor. Preventing the Priestess from resurrecting Eramis was no small feat.

displayProperties.description:
A fragment of Praksis's armor. Deactivating the Technocrat was key in shutting down Eramis's whole enterprise.

1738026524.displaySource: "Do not face your foes head-on. Barrage them from above. Bewilder them with misdirection." —Clovis Bray

2288545809.displaySource: "Our enemies are not subtle, so neither shall we be. Make the chasms echo with the thunder of your artillery." —Clovis Bray

1127995826.displaySource: "It seeps under your skin; settles in your bones. Even outside of its presence, you can feel its chill." —The Exo Stranger

3214023350.displaySource: "A haze permeates the air here, occluding clear sight. Be very sure of your aim." —The Exo Stranger

1937185139.displaySource: "Don't let the Light blind you to what's right before your eyes."  —The Exo Stranger

594789807.displaySource: "The Fallen describe Darkness as a gale. A force of nature, arising suddenly, from seemingly nowhere." —The Exo Stranger

2825865804.displaySource: "A single idea can be enough to alter the spin of entire systems. I've had several of them." —Clovis Bray

506351160.displaySource: "Europa has relit the fire in my soul; one that even its freezing winds cannot chill."  —Clovis Bray

A mysterious engram containing a wide variety of Legendary gear. Its contents are susceptible to influence.

displayProperties.description:
A wrinkled stamp card with Rahool's face on it. It reads:

Welcome to the Engrams Ensiders Club! Focusing valuable gear will earn you AMAZING PRIZES! Punches are redeemable for access to Rahool's advanced focusing techniques!

At the bottom of the card is a line of cramped text:

Master Rahool and the Cryptarch's Union are not liable for any death, disintegration, dismemberment, or other injury sustained in pursuit of engrams. Terms and conditions may apply.
displayProperties.name: Engram Ensiders Stamp Card

displayProperties.description:
This appears to be a gift certificate that exists in several realities at once. Words shift and rewrite themselves before your eyes, promising gleaming appliances that never existed:

"…no home would be complete without…"
"…full washer/dryer combo…"
"…reforms cells endlessly in the comfort of your own home…"
"…rich shag carpeting…"
"…keys that open endless doors between realms of madness and order…"
"…easy-to-clean linoleum…"

You do not think it would be wise to read any further.

(This item can be safely discarded.)
displayProperties.name: Certificate for Impossible Appliances

displayProperties.description:
These appear to be tickets to a vacation destination that exists in several realities at once. The information on the tickets seems to change before your eyes:

"…all-expenses-paid trip to…"
"…series of nested pocket dimensions…"
"…where pain has no meaning…"
"…complimentary continental breakfast…"
"…transmutes flesh into a fine mist…"
"…cruise in elegance and style…"
"…unbound by the limits of linear time…"
"…largest wooden rollercoaster in the Andromeda Galaxy…" 

On second thought, you feel as though you don't need a vacation that badly.

(This item can be safely discarded.)
displayProperties.name: Tickets to Impossible Destinations

displayProperties.description:
• Traveler's Blessings have a chance to be awarded from most chests in the Traveler's Pale Heart. This includes Cyst chests, Lost Sector chests, Overthrow Level 2 and Level 3 encounter chests, Pathfinder Field Assignment chests, and Triage chests.

• Each daily reset, a Lost Sector, Cyst, or Overthrow grant a guaranteed Traveler's Blessing upon completion. Look on the Traveler's Pale Heart map to find out which activity grants a guaranteed blessing!

• Traveler's Blessings awarded from the above sources will always be chosen from the list of expired Traveler's Blessings.

• Once acquired, Traveler's Blessings can be used for 27 hours before expiring.
displayProperties.name: Information
